description: Situated in the small square in front of the cable-car entrance, this typical bar-cum-restaurant with a retro, vaguely English feel serves generous traditional cuisine reinterpreted with a modern twist, including home-made bread and desserts. In summer, meals are served on the terrace with enchanting views of the town, while the two winter dining rooms have a rustic yet elegant feel.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
